cx.corp.lacuna.core.windows

Class ProcessTokenOpener

  • java.lang.Object
    • cx.corp.lacuna.core.windows.ProcessTokenOpener

  • public class ProcessTokenOpener
extends java.lang.Object
    Opens the access token associated with a native process.
    This member depends on one of the Windows API interfaces. The Native.loadLibrary(String, Class) method of the JNA library can be used to load instances of these proxy interfaces.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProcessTokenOpener(Advapi32 advapi, CloseHandle closeHandle)
      Constructs a new ProcessTokenOpener with the specified Windows API Advapi32 and Kernel32 CloseHandle proxy.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessTokenOpener

        public ProcessTokenOpener(Advapi32 advapi,
                          CloseHandle closeHandle)
        Constructs a new ProcessTokenOpener with the specified Windows API Advapi32 and Kernel32 CloseHandle proxy.
        Parameters:
        advapi - the Windows API Advapi32 proxy.
        closeHandle - the Windows API Kernel32 proxy.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if advapi or closeHandle is null.
        This member depends on one of the Windows API interfaces. The Native.loadLibrary(String, Class) method of the JNA library can be used to load instances of these proxy interfaces.

    • Method Detail

      • openToken

        public cx.corp.lacuna.core.windows.ProcessToken openToken(ProcessHandle processHandle)
                                                   throws TokenOpenException
        Opens the access token associated with a native process.

        Opening the process token is handled by the Windows API Advapi32.openProcessToken(int, int, com.sun.jna.ptr.IntByReference) method.

        Parameters:
        processHandle - a handle to the native process.
        Returns:
        the access token associated with the native process.
        Throws:
        TokenOpenException - if opening the access token fails.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if processHandle is null.
